author: cedricsagne
title: A nice promotional
review:
I got this set as a promotional polybag, so for a very low price

Box/Instructions

This is a polybag. It does not actually contain paper instructions but this should not be an obstacle

Parts

Two parts are fairly rare ; the white round plate for the cake actually has a small nipple (I could not even find it on LDD), and the flower base is a part I had never seen before.

The small stereo has a pink printed plate (no sticker) which is a nice thing for a set that size. There is also a pink dish which the target audience will certainly appreciate. It's a party after all!

Minifigures

No minifigs

The build

Very easy, although there were no instructions.

The completed model

It's really awesome. My daughter has immediately found a use for it and used it as a setting for ... well the Stephanie triplets she has.

Overall opinion

Very nice small set for the intended audience.
